instruction.value: Apply a thin film (approximately 2 mm thick) to burn area.

AdditionalNotes.value: Treatment of burns. The burned are should be covered with cream at all times until healing is progressing or burn site is ready for grafting..

AHSFormularyStatus.value: Formulary with Restrictions. Health Canada Special Access Programme.
